title: FPS Drops
body:
I've been having this issue for a few patches now and nothing i do makes the frame rate any better, when i play i keep my frames capped at 244 normally but now even capped i get the frames to go from 244 down to around 96 on average and worse sometimes to 60, this has caused me to lag out of team fights and stall out in game the attempting to reconnect doesn't show up and the lag goes away after i die.  I already did a clean boot, disabled the windows recording software, and have done the recommended guidelines on RIOT's support page nothing has worked.

GTX 970
16 Gb ddr5 ram
990fx sabertooth motherboard
AMD FX-8350 black series

replies.body: Thanks for trying all these steps, and we'd like to help figure this out with you.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to get some logs, and attach them in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will take a look and work with you individually to resolve the frame drops.  We'll see you there!
